items.name: Ahi Poke Chips
items.description: Corn tortilla chips topped with spicy tuna, avocado, eel sauce, and wasabi mayo.

items.name: Chicken Wings
items.description: 5pc chicken wings seasoned with salt, pepper, and garlic. Soy lemon sauce on the side.

items.name: Potstickers (Gyoza)
items.description: Fried or steamed. Contains pork and vegetables.

items.name: Tako Yaki
items.description: Chopped octopus wrapped in potato flour & deep fried. Topped with eel sauce, Japanese mayo, and bonito flakes.

items.name: Vegetable Tempura
items.description: 8pc - zucchini, onion, mushroom, sweet potato, & broccoli

items.name: Crab Salad
items.description: Cucumber spirals, tempura flakes, crabstick, spicy mayo, and ponzu sauce.

items.name: House Salad
items.description: Lettuce, cucumber, carrot, and tomato served with homemade ginger or ranch dressing.

items.name: Miso Soup
items.description: Soybean broth with mushrooms, green onion, tofu, and seaweed.

items.name: Kake Udon
items.description: Shredded imitation crab meat, fish cakes, seaweed, green onion.

items.name: Tempura Udon
items.description: Tempura shrimp, shredded imitation crab meat, fish cake, seaweed, green onion, topped with tempura flakes.

description: Stir fried udon noodles with vegetables
